Name: Keboo GitHub
Description: GitHub integration plugins for Stream Dock

com.keboo.github.action.Name: Open GitHub Repo
com.keboo.github.action.Tooltip: Opens a GitHub repository in your browser

com.keboo.github.prcount.Name: PR Count
com.keboo.github.prcount.Tooltip: Displays the number of open PRs in a GitHub repository

com.keboo.github.actionstatus.Name: Action Status
com.keboo.github.actionstatus.Tooltip: Displays the status of a GitHub Actions workflow
